Итак , ПЛЮСЫ



+Геймплей играется свежо , не в каждой игре тебе дадут почувствовать себя в роли маньяка (Но даже когда ты за мана, ты чувствуешь себя жертвой) 



+Кооператив , все любят кооператив (люблю стопить и продовать своих друзей ману)




+Атмосфера, с самого начала (и не только сначала) тебе и правда страшно (теперь соседи беспокоятся о моем ментальном здоровье)



+Музыка: Действует на атмосферу сугубо положительно , нагнетает там где и когда надо (особенно, когда сзади бежит легион, а все палеты в радиусе 100 метров проданы)



Минусы:




-Сюжет , его тут нет. (ну и нахер он нужен, когда есть предыстории сурвов)


-Отсутствие микрофона(он тоже никому не нужен)  


-Баги (все любят баги, это пиздец как весело) 

 17 проверок реакции из 10
достаточно интересная игра как при игре с друзьями так и без всем советую

I wanna start this review off with a simple nod, I hate this game. 

That being said, here's a pro's and cons list:

Pros:
- Fun to play game with friends
- Fun to play as a Killer
- Very time consuming
- Lots of variety and replayability
- Feeling of accomplishment in surviving a trial or killing all 4 survivors

Cons:
- Game gets less fun the higher rank you are 
- You will feel anger
- Very time consuming
- Requires dedication to learn every Killer, loop and perk set
- Sucks solo unless playing Killer

I've played this game a ton and stream it too, there are good and bad days like any other game. The developers update it constantly and sometimes break things or create a bug, it's life. I'd highly recommend this game to anybody with a PC. The community is awesome (usually) and it's cross-platform too!
我不喜欢，玩的越久越孤独

Dbd is a love hate relationship type game i have over 2k hours on PlayStation and just recently got it for pc . The map designs are frustrating and are the biggest problem with the game and the community can be very toxic and the devs can be lackluster. But the game overall is great and i have tons of fun on it.

한줄평 - "재미는 있는'데'"

분명 재미있는 게임인건 확실합니다 
박진감이 있으면서도 웃음포인트도 많아서 하는내내 친구들과 하면 재미있겠다 이런생각이 들고 
랭크가 높은 살인마를 만났을때 게임시간이 길어지면서 롤플레잉 느낌이 날때는 또다른 즐거움을 주기도 합니다.

장점 
- 게임의 룰자체가 간단하고 단순함
-단순한거치고 박진감이 넘침
-발전기를 고치면서 주변을 살피면서 타이밍에 맞춰서 스페이스바를 누르는게 박진감넘치는 요소
 (쉽고 단순한 룰이고 미션인데 결코 쉽지 않게 만든게 최대 장점 )
- 이 간단함에서 오는 지루함을 잡아두기 위해서 알피지적인 요소를 넣고 능력의 밸런스를 맞추면서 성장하는 재미를 느끼게 한점 

단점
-그 이상 그이하도 아님
-스토리라인이 없어도 너무 없음 (게이머입장에서 스토리라인은 몰입도에 영향을 줌)
조금 플레이를 하다 보면 밤에하는 술래잡기 정도라는 생각에 가벼워짐
-살인자에게서 도망칠때 세상 허무함 
-이런 작은 허점들이 만나 전체적으로 둔탁하다는 느낌을 받음 

도망자의 시점이 3인칭인것이 도망가기에 특권으로 작용하는것은 맞지만 
더 공포감과 박진감을 주기 위해선 도망자도 1인칭으로 하고 다른 밸런스 패치를 하면 공포 게임다워질것 같고 
이 게임의 유일한 컨텐츠인 심장소리를 더 크게하거나 무섭게(?) 만들 필요가 있을듯 합니다

결론 
재미는 있는'데'
遊戲機制很有趣，操作方法簡單但操作空間極廣，很適合拿來舉辦比賽，如果BUG不要那麼多的話就更好了!(?)
Es ist individuell und macht Spaß

Este un joc foarte distractiv de jucat ,atât singur cat și cu prietenii. Are un preț accesibil și o grafică extraordinară. Update-urie sunt destul de dese și smechere. 
Recomand din suflet.

So its me famed steam reviewer yung floppa here with another review, lets start this off with all you do in this game is run around and try to get gens and your teamates are so bad they dont even know how to moonwalk this shit is so bad if your team is ass and the queue time is so long and also,  chicago why dont we start in chicago i mean like chicago map would be so fucking good for the killers like injecting hard drugs into your self to go faster its a win win, also with the gens, put them in chicago so you need to run from the tri state area to chicago

i rate dead by daylight 19 stars out of a possible 32 stars. pretty okay rating. solid rating honestly. im pretty tough when reviewing games. dead by daylight could get some more stars if it had some maps on the moon and stuff. space is pretty cool. dead by daylight has no space maps which is just crazy. like there should be a moon serial killer for sure. like some cheese headed dude that jumps super high or something. maybe he wears a cape. played by harry styles. that would be sick. but yeah thats the review, hope you liked it... let me know what i could have done better, or dont. actually dont. i like to think that im perfect and your criticism would probably hurt my feelings. im pretty fragile. but yeah thats it. thats the review.

Original:
If you have low blood pressure, and feel like everyone around you is super friendly, just play this game, your life will get a huge changes
When you are in a survivor match, better play with friends (yea so-called SWF, since we had a lot tryhard killers such as 4k with 5 gens left, tunneler, face camper)
If you are a lonely killer, good luck if you are not pro (nah since we had a lot tryhard killers so we do have a lot toxic SWF such as teabaggers, etc etc?)
oh ya, I never get into a killer match anyway, always got long queue, idk why tho
Aaaaannnndddd idk why I still play when I gave bad review :) 
Probably I love to get tortured by this wrecked developer, they were asked to fix the bugs and issues, and they probably ignored and keep releasing some incomplete dlcs (remember the Racoon City map got disabled after few hours the RE dlc launched?)
Anyway some killers and survivors really nice to play tho, they have nice perks and was having fun in game

I will still play with my friends, but not playing alone, and will continue be nice to the nice killers, I don't mind to kill by them, but just at least let us do few gens....

(Maybe one day this review will change to Recommended if developer fixed the game?)

Отзывы никто не читает, так что оставлю тут рецепт оладушек.

Ингредиенты:
Сахар 3 столовые ложки
Молоко 200 мл
Соль по вкусу
Пшеничная мука 200 г
Куриное яйцо 1 штука
Растительное масло 50 мл
Уксус 9%-ный ½ чайной ложки
Сода ½ чайной ложки
40 минут
Инструкция приготовления

1. Муку, сахар и щепотку соли смешайте.
2. Яйцо взбейте с молоком, добавьте гашеную уксусом соду. Добавьте муку. Замесите до однородной массы. Тесто должно получиться густым. По необходимости добавьте еще муки.
3. Порциями примерно со столовую ложку вылейте тесто на раскаленную сковороду. Обжарьте с обеих сторон на среднем огне
